high_consensus.description: Add explicit, stepwise rollback instructions per sprint with concrete commands and decision points.
Strengthen Memory Stack migration with verification method, failure modes, dependency checks, and atomicity guarantees.
high_consensus.sprint_section: Task 1.5 acceptance criteria expanded, Task 2.3 acceptance criteria expanded

high_consensus.description: Add lock/idempotency guarantee for concurrent /mount operations to prevent state corruption.

blockers.concern: CI/CD behavior inconsistent; documentation alone may not prevent failures
blockers.resolution: Task 1.4 preflight includes CI detection + auto-init. Task 3.6 adds CI examples. Sprint 1 acceptance criteria updated to include CI guard.

blockers.concern: Silent fallback to vendored may undermine submodule-first goal
blockers.resolution: Task 1.4 updated: always record reason-for-fallback in .loa-version.json, print prominent warning. Success metric updated to track fallback rate.

blockers.concern: Memory Stack relocation risks data loss/corruption
blockers.resolution: Task 1.5 and 2.3 acceptance criteria strengthened: copy-then-verify-then-switch, lock file, rollback on failure.

blockers.concern: Migration command complexity and irreversibility risk
blockers.resolution: Task 2.1 updated: default to --dry-run, require --apply for execution. Rollback command documented. Test matrix for edge cases in Task 2.8.
Task 2.5 acceptance criteria expanded: allowlist expected remote URL, enforce HTTPS, fail closed in CI with --require-submodule.

blockers.concern: Symlink fragility across platforms and repo layouts
blockers.resolution: Task 2.6 updated: canonical path resolver. Task 3.1 tests expanded: different CWDs, nested repo paths. Sprint 2 adds 'symlink health' subcommand.
